thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Yes, Foxconn Can in China

author: Jacky Wong
title: Yes, Foxconn Can in China
text:
Beijing doesn’t just want the Taiwanese company that makes your iPhone to have factories in China. It wants the firm to have a share listing there, too.

The Chinese market regulator has given a subsidiary of Taiwan’s iPhone assembler Foxconn, formally known as Hon Hai Precision Industry, the green light for an initial public offering in Shanghai to fund its $4.3 billion investment plan in China. Foxconn Industrial Internet, which manufactures servers, telecoms equipment and industrial robots, got the regulator’s nod just five... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
